thread.title_full: Obama Visits Alaska, Makes The Rest Of America Jealous Through Instagram

title: Obama Visits Alaska, Makes The Rest Of America Jealous Through Instagram
text:
Obama Visits Alaska, Makes The Rest Of America Jealous Through Instagram Thanks, Obama. We're really feeling that #FOMO now. Dhyana Taylor Politics Intern, The Huffington Post Posted: 09/02/2015 12:47 PM EDT | Edited: 22 minutes ago 
President Barack Obama shared photos of his trip to Alaska on Instagram this week, making mainland Americans wonder why they haven't moved there yet. 
The president embarked on Monday to meet with Alaska residents and see firsthand the negative effects of climate change . Obama also found time to tape an episode of "Running Wild with Bear Grylls." He later shared a selfie he took with the show's host, calling Grylls the "only bear [he] met in the park." 
Check out Obama's photos, signed "bo," below. A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Aug 31, 2015 at 2:32pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 4:49pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 5:18pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 5:43pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 5:51pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 10:39pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 11:30pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Sep 1, 2015 at 11:51pm PDT
